Posts.Content: May 20, 2018 12:20AM djoyp wrote: I have been done with chemo over 3 years and I still have my port. I love it. I am a hard stick so the port saves a lot of anxiety. Usually I hardly feel it being accessed or removed. MUCH easier than arm veins that roll, etc.
Posts.Title: Chemo Port-O-Caths: Did you get one? What was is like? buttercup1 exbrnxgrl
